messages.title: THE LIB DEMS HAVE A RECORD OF VOTING WITH THE TORIES.

quotes.text: Tim Farron admits he had Thatcher poster in his childhood bedroom
David Cameron and Nick Clegg joke as they announce tax rises and huge cuts
Nick Clegg tuition fees betrayal sees young voters name him as most deceitful politician in the country
Tim Farron: Lib Dems would go back into coalition with the Tories

leaflet.additionalNotes: #VoteLabour FOR THE MANY NOT THE FEW
